description:
This week, I’m reviewing Favourite by Fontaines D.C.  I was asked to do this by you - my dear YouTube viewers - in the Comments section. I do read them you know.

Warning: If triggered by pausing and snatches of track, please visit the link below to watch/listen to the song in full - without interruption. Then, if still triggered, watch my Comments episode: . https://youtu.be/RSB6ZiFQpkw 

It won't help.

I thank you.

Favourite: https://youtu.be/0a_vpigwDb4?si=Txb-OSFGM_Y16FyI

For Behind The Scenes footage, tips on ball skills or to talk to me in a monthly Zoom Chat Night, head over to my Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/jushawk

My Shirtless Season Festival Tour with The Darkness (SS24) continues across Europe. Find out where: https://www.thedarknesslive.com/tour-dates/

Get a Justin Hawkins Rides Again T-Shirt & Hoodie here: https://thejawsofvictory.com/

Join my Mailing List here: https://beacons.ai/justinhawkins

To listen to previous episodes of Justin Hawkins Rides Again...The
title: My Second Favourite: Fontaines D.C.
